name: Zombie Killer Truck Driving 3D: Crush & Kill
name_original: Zombie Killer Truck Driving 3D: Crush & Kill
description:
Buckle your seatbelt and start mowing down hordes of the undead in a armor plated zombie-killing machine! Hunt down and plow through walkers across the massive environments like towns, airports, forest, deserts and many more!

Unlock even more powerful, zombie killing truck by doing only one thing, running over as many zombies as you can! Want a real challenge? Face off against the zombie bosses to unlock and drive special 4x4 vehicles. Looking to have a chilled out ride? Relax; drive with style off amazing insane jumps, loops, rooftops, billboards and planes! We've got you covered!

So whether you're out for cleanse the world of the undead hordes of zombies or just pull off some amazing stunts and tricks, jump in, tear it up, and become death on four wheels!

Game Features:
- Several square kilometers of terrain to explore and dominate.
- 9 Heavily armored 4x4 all-terrain trucks, perfect for battling zombies.
- Tons of ramps, tricks, jumps and insane loop-de-loops.
- Secret hidden locations throughout environment.
- Clear HD dynamic camera angles
- Massive zombie hordes to find and run over!
- Completely free!
- Destructible environment objects and vehicles.
- Realistic vehicle physics.
